site fully coded by rand

TIDE

Created two homepage options to align with the 2022 rebrand of TIDE Film Festival. In both options, we strived for a unique yet user-friendly design — to make it standout from it film-festival competitors — by utilizing the new wave-y identitiy.

Below are main snippets from OPTION 1 which utilizes the entire color palette in the indentity and showcases the smaller wave/ inktrap forms. Also, there is a condensed page footer with links to social media and a mailing list.
YEAR 2022
